short_summary: Project to rehabilitate the Snaring River Bridge in Jasper National Park
description: The Snaring River Bridge on Snaring Road needs to be repaired with the following tasks involved in this project: Disposal of damaged asphalt plank seal coat, asphalt plank, laminated deck, concrete, camber shim plates, damaged timber curb, and existing deck joints; Supply and installation of timber end block with steel angle EMSEAL joints, curb segments with through drains, timber deck and new chip seal coat, guardrails, class 2 riprap, and cast-in-place concrete shear blocks; Repair of concrete on vertical and horizontal surfaces at bridge abutments and piers, and damaged sections of bridge rail; Removal of debris at substructure and truss connection points; Tightening loose bolts and install new bolts at locations where existing bolts are missing; Lead paint abatement at localized areas as required. Estimated at $1,000,001 > $5,000,000, and is the ongoing responsibility of Parks Canada.
duration_in_months: All work shall be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules and regulations set out in the National Park Act, and will be completed by 31 March 2025

## Stage 1 - Snaring Bridge Rehabilitation – Jasper National Park

**Tender Information:**

* **Reference Number:** CB-800-13067578
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0304/A
* **Publication Date:** February 7, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 29, 2024, 16:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** February 29, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 8, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

**Procurement Information:**

* **Procurement Category:** Construction
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Alberta

**Contract Information:**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Parks Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 145 McDermot Avenue, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3B 0R9, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Kelly Nuevo, Contract Officer
	+ Phone: (204) 430-7356
	+ Email: [kelly.nuevo@pc.gc.ca](mailto:kelly.nuevo@pc.gc.ca)

**Project Description:**

Parks Canada is seeking a qualified contractor to rehabilitate the Snaring River Bridge on Snaring Road, approximately 17 km Northwest of the townsite of Jasper. The scope of work includes:

1. Disposal of damaged structures such as asphalt planks, laminated decks, concrete, camber shims, and timber curbs.
2. Supply and installation of new structures, including timber end blocks, steel angle EMSEAL joints, curb segments, timber decks, and chip seal coats.
3. Repair of concrete on vertical and horizontal surfaces, as well as damaged sections of bridge rail.
4. Cleaning and removal of debris at substructure and truss connection points.
5. Tightening of loose bolts and installation of new bolts at missing locations.

**Bid Submission:**

Bids will be accepted electronically via email only. The maximum email file size is 15 megabytes. Instructions for submitting bids can be found in the solicitation document.

**Tender Closes at 16:00:00 MST on February 29, 2024.
